channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Michael McIntyre's Big Show
channel.desc: Michael McIntyre hosts an unmissable night of entertainment filmed at London's prestigious Theatre Royal, Drury Lane. Much-loved TV star Alison Hammond bravely hands over her phone to play Send to All, footballing legend Peter Crouch is rudely awakened for a very special Midnight Gameshow in Portugal, multi-platinum-selling singing sensation George Ezra performs his latest hit single, Sweetest Human Being Alive, and there's an outstanding performance from the Unexpected Star of the Show.
